task.title: Building and running the Docker images
task.shortdesc: To run services on the Docker platform, you need to build and run the Docker images as Docker containers on a CentOS 7 host environment. After successful deployment, you can start to use to handle connected clients and devices and also to process messages. You can use the dockerized to administer the dockerized messaging server.

taskbody.prereq: You must have your own CentOS 7 host or you must provision CentOS 7 on a cloud provider such as SoftLayer. You must also install and start Docker 1.6.1 on the CentOS 7 host. For information about installing Docker, see
